Soil is the foundation of all terrestrial ecosystems, providing nutrients and structure.

Our connection with soil is key to emotional balance, physical health and mental acuity—literally.
We humans are from the soil—both figuratively and literally. We are of the soil. Our relationship with living soil is essential and foundational to THRIVING and SUSTAINABILITY.
Through soil, we enhance our intelligence, health and well-being—for mind, body and spirit.
Through soil, we reverse climate change by sequestering carbon from the atmosphere.
Through soil, we heal our environments—especially fresh water, ocean, atmosphere, and agricultural lands.
